org.archive.crawler.settings

类 CrawlSettingsSAXHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.archive.crawler.settings.CrawlSettingsSAXHandler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ValueErrorHandler, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class CrawlSettingsSAXHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements ValueErrorHandler
    An SAX element handler that updates a CrawlerSettings object. This is a helper class for the XMLSettingsHandler.

    • 构造器概要

      Creates a new CrawlSettingsSAXHandler.
